title: Replace app icon with user-provided image

requirements.text: Replace the app icon/favicon with the user-uploaded image 'ChatGPT Image Feb 18, 2026, 03_23_00 PM.png' showing a black dog and orange cat with a surgical scalpel on a blue background

quotes: The app icon did not change. Please change the app icon to the attached image

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image is saved as the favicon in frontend/public/
The index.html file references the new favicon correctly
The app icon displays the new image when loaded in the browser

constraints: Use the exact user-provided image file without modifications
Ensure the favicon reference in index.html points to the correct path
nonGoals: Modifying the image content or appearance
Creating multiple icon sizes or formats
